room_title: Escape room "Haunted" by Escape The Netherworld in Atlanta
review: This was the last game we played out of the 3 available at Escape the Netherworld. We had an absolute blast! It was immersive and challenging Just like the other 2!

room_title: Escape room "Haunted" by Escape The Netherworld in Atlanta
review: Our middle school and high school age Girl Scouts had a blast. They were already asking to go back before we even left. Zack was awesome to work with and the ladies we worked with the day of the event were great also. We will be back!

room_title: Escape room "Haunted" by Escape The Netherworld in Atlanta
review: My group did the haunted room and we had a blast! Our game master was very friendly and gave helpful directions. We are definitely wanting to come back and do the other two rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Haunted" by Escape The Netherworld in Atlanta
review: As a true scaredy-cat, I had so much fun! You really have to work together and we were able to escape the curse of the Night Hag with 6 seconds to spare. All of us were new to escape rooms, and we highly recommend doing this!
